mutants.code:
def max_contig_subarray(arr):
    char_sets = [set(s) for s in arr]
    n = len(arr)
    max_len = 1
    cur_set = set()
    cur_len = 0
    i = 0
    j = 0
    while i < n and j < n:
        if len(cur_set.intersection(char_sets[j])) == 0:
            cur_set = cur_set.union(char_sets[j])
            cur_len += len(arr[j])
            j += 1
            max_len = max(max_len, cur_len)
        else:
            cur_set = cur_set.difference(char_sets[i])
            cur_len -= len(arr[i])
            i += 1
    return max_len
